buildCommand: git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git --depth 1 --branch stable && cd flutter && git fetch --depth 1 origin 2663184aa79047d0a33a14a3b607954f8fdd8730 && git checkout 2663184aa79047d0a33a14a3b607954f8fdd8730 && cd .. && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && flutter config --enable-web && flutter --version && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release
